scripts.update: npm run update-js && npm run update-css
scripts.update-css: npm run update-common-css && npm run update-lane-css
scripts.update-common-css: npx tailwindcss -i `./cli config compiler_dir`/build/tailwind/common.css -o `./cli config asset_dir`/build/style/common.css && ./cli build.asset.sign --direct
scripts.update-lane-css: npx tailwindcss -i `./cli config compiler_dir`/build/tailwind/lane.css -o `./cli config asset_dir`/build/style/lane.css && ./cli build.asset.sign --direct
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css && ./cli build.asset.sign
scripts.build-css: ./cli build.validate && npm run build-common-css && npm run build-lane-css
scripts.build-lane-css: ./cli build.validate && npx tailwindcss -- --minify -i `./cli build.config compiler_dir`/building/tailwind/lane.css -o `./cli build.config compiler_dir`/asset.building/build/style/lane.css
scripts.watch-common-css: npx tailwindcss -i `./cli config compiler_dir`/build/tailwind/common.css -o `./cli config asset_dir`/build/style/common.css -- --watch --verbose
scripts.watch-lane-css: npx tailwindcss -i `./cli config compiler_dir`/build/tailwind/lane.css -o `./cli config asset_dir`/build/style/lane.css  -- --watch --verbose
